{"blocks":[{"key":"9cjjp","text":"Using the FSC measure of the size beads and the known diameters, create a linear equation to approximate spherical size of the diatom cells. Use the median FSC value based on a minimum of 200 cells but ideally 2000 or more.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8j2uh","text":"e.g.   Spherical size = (FSC +275,549)/83,539","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"92hfd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn5qb","text":"Spherical size may also be considered as \"equivalent spherical diameter\" or ESD, as the diatom cells are not actually spherical in shape.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp40","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tex_formula","mutability":"","data":{"formula":"","guid":"D98A69E057CA11ECB49F43762C83EF91","id":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90i0j","text":"For other metrics (granularity and chlorophyll-a), units are given as relative fluoresence units (RFU) from the flow cytometer, which can be used for comparative purposes between samples. 55902.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6d6b4","text":"Take an aliquot of culture:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21fg3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv9dd","text":"Take daily aliquots of culture and take measurements immediately or fix using  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"duijb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sfq2","text":"The size of the aliquot depends on a number of things:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4n1aj","text":"-Total volume of culture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cm8j","text":"-Approximate concentration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ip4c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ua11","text":"As multiple aliquots will be taken, it is important to not remove too much volume or biomass during the experiment, so as to not alter the conditions of the experiment too much.
